divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking at the sky when a bright orange flash caught my eye the flash was the object coming into sight from behond horizon my first though was it was a meteor burning up but wasn't burning up it flew directly over me and the orange light I saw seeing was unlike any orange I light I have ever seen before it only lasted about 7 seconds before clearing the opposite horizon, I may add that this is the same date people in nyc claimed to see ufos and was on the news. I saw what many people must of pointed up and shouted for everyone to look at saw. I now conclude that the orange light was ionized air around the craft used for magnetic propulsion. ill never forget the sight.
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Fireball, Sphere, Star-like, Other
Summary: thought was a meteor burning up came from one horizon directly over me dissaperard over the oppisite horizon bright orange super fast object
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pompton Lakes
There were no other sightings in Pompton Lakes on or around October 13th 2010
